level.heading: ELECTRONIC FILING AND SERVICE OF ORDERS AND OTHER PAPERS (ยง 27-408)

level.text: The Board may issue, file, and serve notices, orders, and other documents electronically, subject to the provisions of these Rules.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 2078 (March 8, 2002); as amended by Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 4782 (May 20, 2005) [EXPIRED].
